headline.main: For Fight Even if Road Is Cut

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, Feb. 2 (U.P.) -- The Communist newspaper New China Daffy today urged China to carry on the war against Japan even if the Burma Road were cut and regardless of any Tokyo "peace offensive" aimed at releasing Japanese troops from China for use in the South Pacific.
abstract: Chinese press comment on Singapore defense
